import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { getAll } from "./BooksAPI"; function SearchPage({displaySearchPage}){ const [value, setValue] = useState([]) const [books, setBooks] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ getAll().then((res) => ( setBooks(res),console.log(res))); },[]) return (
displaySearchPage(true)} > Close
    {books.map((book, index)=>(
  1. {`${book.title}`}
    {`${book.author}`}
    2. ))}
) } export default SearchPage
